subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon led the Liberty out of a 9-point hole in the fourth quarter, but she struggled to keep up on defense against Diana Taurasi, who had 34 points.
snippet: Shameka Christon led the Liberty out of a 9-point hole in the fourth quarter, but she struggled to keep up on defense against Diana Taurasi, who had 34 points.
